thread.title: James Cowell
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by James Cowell

author: James Cowell
title: James Cowell
text: I ordered a Barbour jacket that I'd had my eye on for a while, it was on sale already with 10% extra off so I treated myself. It arrived next day by DPD and I am very happy with it.
